ruleset_used.description: Name of the ruleset used for analysis
ruleset_used.title: Ruleset Used

llm_validation_enabled.description: Whether LLM validation was enabled for this analysis
llm_validation_enabled.title: Llm Validation Enabled

analysis_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the analysis was performed
analysis_timestamp.title: Analysis Timestamp

evidence_context_size.description: Size of context used for evidence extraction
evidence_context_size.title: Evidence Context Size

BaseFindingEvidence.description: Evidence item with content and collection timestamp.
BaseFindingEvidence.title: BaseFindingEvidence

GDPRDataSubjectFindingMetadata.description:
Metadata for GDPR data subject classification findings.

Extends BaseFindingMetadata which provides:
- source: str - Source file or location where the data was found
- context: dict[str, object] - Extensible context for pipeline metadata

source.description: Source file or location where the data was found
source.title: Source

context.description: Extensible context for pipeline metadata (connector_type, artifact_id, etc.)
context.title: Context

GDPRDataSubjectFindingMetadata.title: GDPRDataSubjectFindingMetadata

GDPRDataSubjectFindingModel.description:
GDPR data subject classification finding structure.

Represents a data subject indicator that has been enriched with
GDPR-specific classification information. Risk is indicated by
risk_modifiers - e.g., minors (Article 8) or vulnerable individuals
(Recital 75) require additional protections under GDPR.

evidence.description: Evidence items with content and timestamps for this finding
evidence.title: Evidence

matched_patterns.description: Patterns that were matched during analysis with occurrence counts
matched_patterns.title: Matched Patterns

typical_lawful_bases.description: Typical GDPR Article 6 lawful bases for processing this data subject type
typical_lawful_bases.title: Typical Lawful Bases

metadata.description: Additional metadata from the original data source

GDPRDataSubjectFindingModel.title: GDPRDataSubjectFindingModel

GDPRDataSubjectSummary.description: Summary statistics for GDPR data subject classification findings.

total_findings.description: Total number of classified data subject findings
total_findings.title: Total Findings

high_risk_count.description: Number of findings with risk modifiers (e.g., minors, vulnerable individuals)
high_risk_count.title: High Risk Count

GDPRDataSubjectSummary.title: GDPRDataSubjectSummary

PatternMatchDetail.description:
Detail about a matched pattern including occurrence count.

This structured type replaces simple pattern strings to provide
richer information about how many times each pattern was found,
which is useful for auditing and confidence assessment.

match_count.description: Number of times this pattern matched in the content
match_count.title: Match Count

PatternMatchDetail.title: PatternMatchDetail

description:
Complete output structure for gdpr_data_subject schema.

This model represents the full wire format for GDPR data subject
classification results, including findings enriched with GDPR-specific
information, summary statistics, and analysis metadata.

findings.description: List of data subject findings with GDPR classification
findings.title: Findings

summary.description: Summary statistics of the GDPR classification analysis

title: GDPRDataSubjectFindingOutput
